project5.title: Excel Scraper
project5.desc: Tool for automatic data consolidation from multiple Excel files. Processes and combines information from different sources, applying business rules and generating custom reports.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Developer specialized in automation and efficient solutions
about.whoText: I'm a developer with experience in automation, web scraping, and efficient application development. I specialize in creating tools that optimize processes using Python and other technologies. My focus is on efficiency, scalability, and ease of use, developing solutions for data extraction and analysis, remote control, and functional web applications.
about.approachText: I specialize in developing automated tools and scraping systems adaptable to different types of data and platforms. I seek to optimize processes and create scalable solutions that are easy to integrate. My projects range from advanced web scraping to mobile and web application development, always prioritizing performance and usability.

skills.subtitle: These are the technologies and skills I master

automationList.item1: Web scraping with Python (Selenium, BeautifulSoup, Scrapy)

frontendList.item1: HTML, CSS, JavaScript (no frameworks, pure code)
